backend/main.mo: Defines the main game canister with data types for players, combat, clans, dungeons, and storage maps, integrating migrations and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Contains legacy type definitions and structures needed for migrating older stored data to the current backend format.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test cases.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of key frontend files for documentation and build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based CSS variables and theme settings for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, page routing, layout rendering, and profile setup gating.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login flow and shows a login card until authenticated, then renders children.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Provides the main game UI layout with header, navigation bar, user info, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Displays a profile setup form allowing players to create a profile and set a username, with optional advanced principal info.
frontend/src/components/ProgressionPanel: Shows a survivor’s level, experience progress, and key stats in a styled panel.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider to manage login state, identity loading, and authentication actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile data and other game-related backend interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light and dark theme CSS variables for colors and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin interface allowing currency grants, killer unlocks, level changes, item additions, and event creation.
frontend/src/pages/AnnouncementsPage.tsx: Displays announcements and allows admins to create new ones with title and message inputs.
frontend/src/pages/AuraClickerPage.tsx: Implements the Aura Clicker game with aura power clicking, leveling, rebirth logic, and progress display.
frontend/src/pages/ClansPage.tsx: Shows clan marketplace, join listings, and provides UI for creating listings, creating clans, and joining clans.
frontend/src/pages/DungeonPage.tsx: Displays dungeons and quests, allowing quest start/complete actions and crate unlocking with reward display.
frontend/src/pages/GameplayPage.tsx: Implements the gameplay UI, handling enemy and bot combat using query hooks, state for fights, and predefined enemy/boss stats.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays a welcome screen with navigation to core gameplay sections and shows basic user profile status like survivors and killers.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Shows the user's weapons and pets, allowing equipping items using mutation hooks and rendering item stats.
frontend/src/pages/KillersPage.tsx: Lists all killers with unlock status and stats, and provides a button to unlock the next killer via a mutation.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Renders the shop with purchasable items, including an expensive admin panel, and handles purchase actions with mutations.
frontend/src/pages/SocialPage.tsx: Implements the Social page with follow/unfollow, friend detection, username-to-principal resolution, and displaying followers, following, and friends.
frontend/src/pages/SurvivorsPage.tsx: Displays the user's survivors, allows creating new survivors with custom stats, and lets the user set an active survivor.
frontend/src/pages/UpdatesPage.tsx: Shows a list of static game update entries with version info, dates, descriptions, and feature lists.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s current game features, requirements, issues, and architectural notes using a structured state file.
